title: Gifted someone a skin and it hasn't gotten to them even though they're online
body: Exactly what the title says, I gifted someone a skin and they were online in the SAME LOBBY as me and they never got them. They were online for 8 hours yesterday and STILL Did not get the gifts I sent them. Why does it always take forever for the skins I gift someone to get to them when they're online at the same time as me? They're not afk. They're in the same lobby as me waiting to start a game and the skins just don't go through until they feel like. Someone please explain what this is, hopefully a rioter.

replies.body: Looks like all three of those skins did safely make it onto your friend's account. He may not have seen the notification for some reason, but those 3 skins are already available for your friend to use. If they aren't seeing the skins, I'd have them reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what's going wrong.
Thanks for replying! It's strange, I didn't get the notification saying they got them nor did they get a popup. They do indeed have the skins. Thank you for looking into this quickly.

> [{quoted}](name=Captain Teemo666,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EW6QIe6P,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-21T08:05:38.429+0000)
>
> Thanks for replying! It's strange, I didn't get the notification saying they got them nor did they get a popup. They do indeed have the skins. Thank you for looking into this quickly.

This happened to me on November 25 as well, gifted my 2 son's each some RP, they received it, but had no notification in game that it came, and I had no notification that they received it.
